name: Taubooza Land Ramadan Edition
description:
Taubooza Land is a platformer game that takes players on an epic adventure in the colorful and whimsical world of the tauboozas, creatures that look like balls with eyes and mouth. The game features dozens of levels with different themes and challenges, where players have to collect coins and avoid enemies. The game is full of surprises, secrets, and fun!

Everyday of the holy month a new challenge with different game type.

this a demo for 4 days of 30 days of Ramadan's Nights. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Day01=> 

Place : Tauboozas Village. 

Type: Recourse gathering 3d.

Task: gather 100 wood, 100 food, 100 stone, 100 gold.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Day02=> 

Place : Goblin Land. 

Type: 3d platformer. 

Task: Collect the 4 pieces of treasure map and collect 50 coin of gold.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Day03=> Aliens turn you into 2d.    

Place => 2d village. 

Type: 2d platformer.

Task: Collect 50 gold and get to the space ship.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Day04=>

Place => Space. 

Type: 2d space ship game.

Task: Destroy all aliens to get back to 3d again.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Day start at 08:00 end with Maghreb's prayer at 18:00.

If you reach Maghreb's prayer without completing your tasks you'll lose.

so hurry up the "Clock is Ticking "  .

Good Luck.
